description.lang: Create the perfect climate in your home, at the perfect time, which is anytime now that there are Nexia Home Intelligence and Trane ComfortLink thermostats. Away on vacation or business, you can check your homes temperature settings and adjust to save energy. Heading home from the beach? Turn up the a/c so its nice and cool when you arrive. As the weather changes, so can your pre-set heating and cooling schedules, with a touch or a click. Now you have remote capability to control your homes comfort and efficiency quite easily via most web-accessible computers, tablets or smart phones.This product is only available through a participating Trane Dealer.This product is only available in the U.S. and Canada
